remarks: Embedding of permutation signs into a ring results in an element of the ring.  (Contributed by AV, 1-Jan-2019.)
statement:
zrhpsgnelbas.p $e |- P = ( Base ` ( SymGrp ` N ) ) $.
zrhpsgnelbas.s $e |- S = ( pmSgn ` N ) $.
zrhpsgnelbas.y $e |- Y = ( ZRHom ` R ) $.
zrhcopsgnelbas $p |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ N e. Fin /\ Q e. P ) -> ( ( Y o. S ) ` Q ) e. ( Base ` R ) ) $.
